publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-767 Michael McMahon: Fair Trade Status for Hamilton-That the Parliament supports the bid by Hamilton to gain fair trade status; commends the growing awareness of people in Scotland of the issues surrounding fair trade and the desire to be involved in such a positive way to tackle the injustice of poverty, and recognises the ongoing importance of fair trade as an effective way of empowering disadvantaged producers through receiving a fairer deal.

S2M-767 Michael McMahon: Fair Trade Status for Hamilton-That the Parliament supports the bid by Hamilton to gain fair trade status; commends the growing awareness of people in Scotland of the issues surrounding fair trade and the desire to be involved in such a positive way to tackle the injustice of poverty, and recognises the ongoing importance of fair trade as an effective way of empowering disadvantaged producers through receiving a fairer deal. Supported by: Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-767 Fair Trade Status for Hamilton (lodged on 8 January 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-767 Fair Trade Status for Hamilton (lodged on 8 January 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-767 Fair Trade Status for Hamilton (lodged on 8 January 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-767 Fair Trade Status for Hamilton (lodged on 8 January 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-767 Fair Trade Status for Hamilton (lodged on 8 January 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-767 Fair Trade Status for Hamilton (lodged on 8 January 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-767 Fair Trade Status for Hamilton (lodged on 8 January 2004) Karen Gillon*
S2M-767 Fair Trade Status for Hamilton (lodged on 8 January 2004) Helen Eadie*
S2M-767 Fair Trade Status for Hamilton (lodged on 8 January 2004) Elaine Smith*
